title: SEAFORT / DESERTER MURDER
description:
Getting him to admit to it by piling on evidence.

DRAMA (INT) red check

dialogueTree.title: The Deserter: ""Petty-bourgeois law..." He snorts..."
dialogueTree.text: "Petty-bourgeois law..." He snorts and spits. "This is all you care about, right? The only thing in the world for you types..."

links.title: Perception (Sight): "A drop of blood in the saliva..."
links.text: A drop of blood in the saliva...

links.title: Half Light: "Tear into him again. Pile it on him..."
links.text: Tear into him again. Pile it on him.

links.title: Drama: "Lie! You have a witness."
links.text: Lie! You have a witness.

links.title: You: ""There were May bells behind the vi..."
links.text: "There were May bells behind the victim's window." (Show him the dried flower.)

links.title: The Deserter: ""Damn May bells..." He looks at the..."
links.text: "Damn May bells..." He looks at the blossoming field behind you. "The whole island is turning white with them..."

links.title: Empathy: "He seems tender suddenly, nostalgic..."
links.text: He seems tender suddenly, nostalgic even. A strange mood swing.

links.title: The Deserter: ""So many this year too. The spring..."
links.text: "So many this year too. The spring is coming, no... it's already here. Wash the filth away..."

links.title: You: ""I haven't seen these flowers anywh..."
links.text: "I haven't seen these flowers anywhere else in Martinaise. Only here."

links.title: The Deserter: ""They blossom on the islets before...."
links.text: "They blossom on the islets before. We fertilized them with our blood." He looks to the water. "RÃ¨surrection was snow white in May, before they ruined it."

links.title: Shivers: "South, the Bay of Martinaise is dot..."
links.text: South, the Bay of Martinaise is dotted with little freckles of islets, turning green, with white flowers in white snow...

links.title: The Deserter: ""The coast too -- before they piled..."
links.text: "The coast too -- before they piled their containers on top of it. Filled with broken, useless trash for fat fingered bourgeois children to play with..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You must get around a lot -- to st..."
links.text: "You must get around a lot -- to stay undetected all these years..." The lieutenant's voice is soft, friendly. "Do you know any *secret* paths? Pinball workshops?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""I may..." A curious tremor passes..."
links.text: "I may..." A curious tremor passes his face.

links.title: Cuno: ""Bet you've been sneaking around a..."
links.text: "Bet you've been sneaking around a lot... hidden." The kid sounds agitated. "Know any secret paths? Cuno knows paths..."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "He must get around a lot -- to stay..."
links.text: He must get around a lot -- to stay undetected all these years.

links.title: You: ""You've been in Martinaise your who..."
links.text: "You've been in Martinaise your whole life -- know any... secret paths?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""I may..." A strange tremor passes..."
links.text: "I may..." A strange tremor passes his face.

links.title: You: ""A young woman called Klaasje -- ri..."
links.text: "A young woman called Klaasje -- ring any bells? Flowers like these were behind her window." (Continue.)

links.title: The Deserter: ""*Klaasje*...""
links.text: "*Klaasje*..."

links.title: Suggestion: "He repeats the name with care. As i..."
links.text: He repeats the name with care. As if it were at risk of breaking.

links.title: Logic: "He knows her -- but hadn't heard th..."
links.text: He knows her -- but hadn't heard the name.

links.title: You: ""Yes Klaasje. You hadn't heard her..."
links.text: "Yes Klaasje. You hadn't heard her name, had you?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""My ears don't reach the city.""
links.text: "My ears don't reach the city."

links.title: You: ""You know her, right? She had intim..."
links.text: "You know her, right? She had intimate relations with the victim. The mercenary."

links.title: The Deserter: ""With the *victim*..." He turns his..."
links.text: "With the *victim*..." He turns his sight from the whitening field of flowers and falls silent. Then the muscles in his jaw twitch, a spasm.

links.title: Composure: "There is a small tremble -- looks l..."
links.text: There is a small tremble -- looks like a smile. A crooked smile. Yet isn't quite voluntary. He's about to burst...

links.title: The Deserter: "He suddenly jerks to life: "You kno..."
links.text: He suddenly jerks to life: "You know who he was -- a Coalition trained murderer, armoured and armed. He wasn't human, the blunt end of a hammer, *dripping with blood*..."

links.title: You: ""He was a rapist. I'm not saying he..."
links.text: "He was a rapist. I'm not saying he didn't deserve it."

links.title: The Deserter: ""...beating us to the ground. Moani..."
links.text: "...beating us to the ground. Moaning with joy..." He breathes in with strange animation: "You hounds get so thorough when a company-trained killer dies. I haven't seen you on this coast for *forty years*. You know... maybe I should have killed one sooner?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Got your attention..." He looks yo..."
links.text: "Got your attention..." He looks you dead in the eye, pupils shaking. "*Now* you stop beating druggies and prostitutes in your basement. *Now* you come to investigate. Not when they die by the hundreds..." He breathes through flared nostrils...

links.title: Rhetoric: "This is it. Shot him, shot him, say..."
links.text: This is it. Shot him, shot him, say shot him not killed him...

links.title: You: ""So you killed him?""
links.text: "So you killed him?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Oh the inhumanity..." He closes hi..."
links.text: "Oh the inhumanity..." He closes his black eyes. "One paramilitary less in Revachol." You can almost see him squeeze a tear out of his eye. His fists begin to tremble from the anger.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant raises his right arm..."
links.text: The lieutenant raises his right arm to hush you...

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Hush, he does not need to be pushed..."
links.text: Hush, he does not need to be pushed any more. The ball is rolling...

links.title: Composure: "...while the lieutenant listens, ho..."
links.text: ...while the lieutenant listens, holding his breath.

links.title: You: "Just nod."
links.text: Just nod.

links.title: The Deserter: ""I *had* them in my sights, both of..."
links.text: "I *had* them in my sights, both of them -- him and the whore. I was breathing with them, in phase, and I pulled the trigger and flew on the air until I landed in his mouth..." He begins to smile.

links.title: The Deserter: ""I didn't think I had a shot like t..."
links.text: "I didn't think I had a shot like that in me anymore. I did. I saw him kneel there with his mouth full of death and that stupid look on his face." The smile quivers. "And his dick still in her..."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "There. A hot flash of rage almost c..."
links.text: There. A hot flash of rage almost carries the smile away. Some dark piece...

links.title: You: ""Then what?""
links.text: "Then what?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Nothing. I went to sleep. Next mor..."
links.text: "Nothing. I went to sleep. Next morning there were May bells everywhere. The world was white -- or what's left of it anyway. My last spring here... I knew the fascists would come to avenge their own..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""And so they did.""
links.text: "And so they did."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mr. Dros -- are you aware you're c..."
links.text: "Mr. Dros -- are you aware you're confessing to murder?" the lieutenant asks after a second of silence.

links.title: The Deserter: ""Yes." A single word is all he give..."
links.text: "Yes." A single word is all he gives.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And you were looking at them -- th..."
links.text: "And you were looking at them -- the victim and a young woman -- having sex? Through the scope of your rifle that night? Before you shot him?" The lieutenant takes out his notebook slowly, very slowly.

links.title: The Deserter: "The old man nods."
links.text: The old man nods.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why?""
links.text: "Why?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Because that's what they were doin..."
links.text: "Because that's what they were doing..." He shrugs, then smacks his lips.

links.title: Logic: "The motive! This is where the motiv..."
links.text: The motive! This is where the motive is going to come from...

links.title: Suggestion: "You can coax it out of him, the lie..."
links.text: You can coax it out of him, the lieutenant's preparing the ground.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't understand." He turns to y..."
links.text: "I don't understand." He turns to you. "Do you, detective? I don't understand this part."

links.title: You: ""One more thing -- *why* were you l..."
links.text: "One more thing -- *why* were you looking at them that night?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""I'm always looking..." He cocks hi..."
links.text: "I'm always looking..." He cocks his head to the side -- then turns his eyes to the city. Another tremor passes his right side, lower in intensity.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Are you *always looking* through t..."
links.text: "Are you *always looking* through the scope of a rifle?" He explains: "I'm just trying to *understand*."

links.title: The Deserter: ""A rifle's scope has the best magni..."
links.text: "A rifle's scope has the best magnification."

links.title: Half Light: "Helps him see all the *shit*..."
links.text: Helps him see all the *shit*...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And if you don't like it...""
links.text: "And if you don't like it..."

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Click."
links.text: Click.

links.title: You: ""...you pull the trigger?""
links.text: "...you pull the trigger?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Yes." He looks you in the eye. "Th..."
links.text: "Yes." He looks you in the eye. "Think of it as a form of critique."

links.title: Conceptualization: "He will *not* stop now, these diale..."
links.text: He will *not* stop now, these dialectical materialist types never do. Exploit it.

links.title: Logic: "You got him going. Connect every li..."
links.text: You got him going. Connect every little piece now. Wrap this up like a gift...

links.title: Suggestion: "Start with when he first saw him? I..."
links.text: Start with when he first saw him? It will give him a chance to ramble.

links.title: You: ""...if it's part of the *shit* you..."
links.text: "...if it's part of the *shit* you see..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""...then you pull the trigger?""
links.text: "...then you pull the trigger?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Yes." He looks the lieutenant in t..."
links.text: "Yes." He looks the lieutenant in the eye. "Think of it as a form of *critique*."

links.title: Cuno: ""...then you pull the trigger?""
links.text: "...then you pull the trigger?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Yes." He looks the kid in the eye...."
links.text: "Yes." He looks the kid in the eye. "Think of it as a form of *critique*."

links.title: The Deserter: ""I pull the trigger." He looks you..."
links.text: "I pull the trigger." He looks you in the eye. "Think of it as a form of *critique*."

links.title: Cuno: ""You always creepin' on people thro..."
links.text: "You always creepin' on people through your scope like that?" The kid squints his eyes.

links.title: The Deserter: ""A rifle's scope has the best magni..."
links.text: "A rifle's scope has the best magnification."

links.title: Half Light: "Helps him see all the *shit*..."
links.text: Helps him see all the *shit*...

links.title: Cuno: ""And if you don't like what you see..."
links.text: "And if you don't like what you see..."

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Click."
links.text: Click.

links.title: Interfacing: "He has his specific device for it t..."
links.text: He has his specific device for it though.

links.title: You: ""With binoculars?""
links.text: "With binoculars?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""No. A rifle's scope has better mag..."
links.text: "No. A rifle's scope has better magnification."

links.title: Half Light: "Helps him see all the *shit*..."
links.text: Helps him see all the *shit*...

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Click."
links.text: Click.

links.title: You: ""And if you don't like it...""
links.text: "And if you don't like it..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Then I pull the trigger." He looks..."
links.text: "Then I pull the trigger." He looks dead in the eye. "Think of it as a form of *critique*."

links.title: You: ""...and if it's, you know, part of..."
links.text: "...and if it's, you know, part of all that *shit* you see..."

links.title: You: ""Through the scope of your rifle?""
links.text: "Through the scope of your rifle?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""A rifle's scope has the best magni..."
links.text: "A rifle's scope has the best magnification." He nods.

links.title: You: ""How?""
links.text: "How?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""A rifle's scope has the best magni..."
links.text: "A rifle's scope has the best magnification."

links.title: The Deserter: ""And so they did.""
links.text: "And so they did."

links.title: Cuno: ""Fuckin' hell..." The kid looks at..."
links.text: "Fuckin' hell..." The kid looks at him for one, maybe two seconds, breathing heavy with excitement.

links.title: Volition: "Be very very precise now... don't m..."
links.text: Be very very precise now... don't make a splash, you can still mess it up.

links.title: You: ""Boom -- the *revelation*.""
links.text: "Boom -- the *revelation*."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Moronic, gloating psychopath." He..."
links.text: "Moronic, gloating psychopath." He squints.

links.title: Logic: "Now, a motive! You still need a mot..."
links.text: Now, a motive! You still need a motive, the confession alone isn't enough...

links.title: You: "Wait, motive, why?"
links.text: Wait, motive, why?

links.title: Logic: "He could say he was taking the fall..."
links.text: He could say he was taking the fall for someone. Insane. Coerced. It's useless in court without a motive, don't mess this up...

links.title: Suggestion: "Coax it out of him... he's still wa..."
links.text: Coax it out of him... he's still warm. They were fucking...

links.title: You: "Yeah, yeah, shush!"
links.text: Yeah, yeah, shush!

links.title: Logic: "No, not shush! He could say he was..."
links.text: No, not shush! He could say he was taking the fall for someone. Insane. Coerced. It's useless in court without a motive, don't mess this up...

links.title: Authority: "A motive. A *real* cop gets a motiv..."
links.text: A motive. A *real* cop gets a motive now.

links.title: You: "Wait, motive, why?"
links.text: Wait, motive, why?

links.title: Authority: "He could say he was taking the fall..."
links.text: He could say he was taking the fall for someone. It's useless in court without a motive, go be a cop now, don't mess it up...

links.title: You: "Yeah, yeah, shush!"
links.text: Yeah, yeah, shush!

links.title: Authority: "You don't shush me! He could say he..."
links.text: You don't shush me! He could say he was taking the fall for someone. Or disoriented. A confession is useless without a motive, don't mess this up.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "A motive. There's some *seedy* moti..."
links.text: A motive. There's some *seedy* motive here, don't you feel it? Get the motive.

links.title: You: "Wait, motive, why?"
links.text: Wait, motive, why?

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Of course this is only your mesolim..."
links.text: Of course this is only your mesolimbic reward pathway -- what does it know about police matters? Maybe you should just get high instead? This is such an unimportant moment.

links.title: You: "High yes. Let's get high!"
links.text: High yes. Let's get high!

links.title: Electrochemistry: "There's no high greater than a case..."
links.text: There's no high greater than a case solved for you, when will you learn? Get the motive, don't mess this up...

links.title: You: "Wait, no, motive. Yes. Seems import..."
links.text: Wait, no, motive. Yes. Seems important.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Right."
links.text: Right.

links.title: You: "Yeah, yeah, shush!"
links.text: Yeah, yeah, shush!

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Quick, a motive, while the iron is..."
links.text: Quick, a motive, while the iron is still hot. Get one out of him.

links.title: You: "Wait, motive, why?"
links.text: Wait, motive, why?

links.title: Reaction Speed: "He could say he was taking the fall..."
links.text: He could say he was taking the fall for someone. Disoriented, tortured. It's useless in court without a motive, don't mess this up...

links.title: You: "Yeah, yeah, shush!"
links.text: Yeah, yeah, shush!

links.title: Reaction Speed: "No, not shush! He could say he was..."
links.text: No, not shush! He could say he was taking the fall for someone. Disoriented. Tortured. It's useless in court without a motive, don't mess this up...

links.title: You: ""Boom -- I got you. Me, the most bo..."
links.text: "Boom -- I got you. Me, the most boring cop on Earth."

links.title: You: ""Boom! I got you!""
links.text: "Boom! I got you!"

links.title: You: ""I just fuckin' nailed you. Superco..."
links.text: "I just fuckin' nailed you. Supercop of Jamrock."

links.title: You: ""I just nailed you. Me. Fucking *me..."
links.text: "I just nailed you. Me. Fucking *me* -- this sorry cop."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Adolescent imbecile..." He squints..."
links.text: "Adolescent imbecile..." He squints.

links.title: You: ""God damn right I did. I just naile..."
links.text: "God damn right I did. I just nailed you."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Adolescent imbecile." He squints."
links.text: "Adolescent imbecile." He squints.

links.title: You: ""Do you understand you're confessin..."
links.text: "Do you understand you're confessing to murder -- to a police officer?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Yes." A single word is all he give..."
links.text: "Yes." A single word is all he gives.

links.title: You: "Hold your breath."
links.text: Hold your breath.

links.title: You: ""How did you...""
links.text: "How did you..."

links.title: You: ""So you shot him?""
links.text: "So you shot him?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Oh the inhumanity..." He closes hi..."
links.text: "Oh the inhumanity..." He closes his black eyes. "One paramilitary less in Revachol." You can almost see him squeeze a tear out of his eye. His fists begin to tremble from the anger.

links.title: You: ""On second thought -- about somethi..."
links.text: "On second thought -- about something else..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Figured." He sighs and holds his l..."
links.text: "Figured." He sighs and holds his lower abdomen. A flash of pain there... it angers him.

links.title: You: ""He was a killer. But he was still..."
links.text: "He was a killer. But he was still under the protection of the law."

links.title: You: ""He was a soldier too. He was a man.""
links.text: "He was a soldier too. He was a man."

links.title: Logic: "Don't leave any loose ends. Get him..."
links.text: Don't leave any loose ends. Get him on everything.

links.title: Suggestion: "Almost. But you need *one* more. Ju..."
links.text: Almost. But you need *one* more. Just one. Or maybe two...

links.title: You: ""May bells -- behind the victim's w..."
links.text: "May bells -- behind the victim's window! I saw them growing *here*." (Point to them.)

links.title: The Deserter: ""Damn May bells..." He looks at the..."
links.text: "Damn May bells..." He looks at the blossoming field: "The whole island is turning white with them..."

links.title: You: ""I wonder what brand of boots you'r..."
links.text: "I wonder what brand of boots you're wearing?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Everything is brands with you indi..."
links.text: "Everything is brands with you individualists... Who cares what *brand* my shoes are? Sansa..." He looks at his running shoes, covered in mud. "Some shit."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Show me the soles please, Mr. Dros.""
links.text: "Show me the soles please, Mr. Dros."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Fucking imbecile..." The old man s..."
links.text: "Fucking imbecile..." The old man stretches out his leg. A black and white spiral pattern covers the sole of the worn out old running shoes on his feet.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "The maker is Sansarique -- the mode..."
links.text: The maker is Sansarique -- the model is Corbeille and the size is 43.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "These are not the unusual, horizont..."
links.text: These are not the unusual, horizontal patterned soles you saw in the dust on the floor of the hidden room. They do, however, seem to be about the same size...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The size fits, but not the sole......"
links.text: "The size fits, but not the sole..." The lieutenant comes to the same conclusion.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The size fits, but not the sole......"
links.text: "The size fits, but not the sole..." The lieutenant leans in to inspect.

links.title: You: "Wait, maybe it's simpler than that...."
links.text: Wait, maybe it's simpler than that...

links.title: Drama: "Sire, he doesn't have to be wearing..."
links.text: Sire, he doesn't have to be wearing them *right now*.

links.title: You: ""People change shoes. It doesn't me..."
links.text: "People change shoes. It doesn't mean you weren't there -- near the room the victim died in -- sneaking around."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Racking those brains, are you?" He..."
links.text: "Racking those brains, are you?" He squints at you, black pearls gleaming with hatred. "Desperate to report something back to your masters. They must have really loved that dead fuck..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant gives you a quick si..."
links.text: The lieutenant gives you a quick sideways glance and nods to acknowledge...

links.title: Drama: "The prints were his, you can see it..."
links.text: The prints were his, you can see it in those eyes, he can't keep them from flickering, looking for something...

links.title: Cuno: "The kid gives you a quick sideways..."
links.text: The kid gives you a quick sideways glance and nods to acknowledge...

links.title: Drama: "Simpler? No. This is another loose..."
links.text: Simpler? No. This is another loose thread you will *never* connect!

links.title: You: ""God damn footprints, everywhere......"
links.text: "God damn footprints, everywhere... I hate them..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant raises his brow."
links.text: The lieutenant raises his brow.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "What are you doing, he's thinking...."
links.text: What are you doing, he's thinking. We almost got him here.

links.title: Volition: "Not now. Stop yourself."
links.text: Not now. Stop yourself.

links.title: You: ""Khm." (Cough.)"
links.text: "Khm." (Cough.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""People *change* shoes, detective....."
links.text: "People *change* shoes, detective..." He turns to the old man. "It was you. You were there, weren't you, crawling in the Whirling-in-Rags..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He leans closer. "What were you doi..."
links.text: He leans closer. "What were you doing? Some kind of reconnaissance? Preparing the scene? Listening in on her?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Tryin' to rack your brains..." He..."
links.text: "Tryin' to rack your brains..." He squints at him, eyes gleaming with hatred: "You're *desperate* to report something back to your masters. They must have really loved that dead fuck..."

links.text: "What do we do now, we're not getting these prints to match..."

links.text: "Yes. You were in the Whirling-in-Rags. What were you doing there? Sneaking?"

links.text: "What do we do now, we're not getting these prints to match..."

links.text: "What are you talking about?"

links.title: Volition: "Not now!  Don't melt down now, you'..."
links.text: Not now!  Don't melt down now, you're so close. Rewind this back to the previous thought and just say that.

links.title: You: ""What do I do now?! I'll never get..."
links.text: "What do I do now?! I'll never get these prints to match."

links.title: The Deserter: ""You're *desperate* to report somet..."
links.text: "You're *desperate* to report something back to your masters." He squints at you, black pearls gleaming with hatred. "They must have really loved that dead fuck..."

links.title: You: ""Who cares about shoes, we got you..."
links.text: "Who cares about shoes, we got you without the prints too."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Corrupt henchman of paedophiles......"
links.text: "Corrupt henchman of paedophiles..." The old man shakes his head. "You're desperate to report something back to them, aren't you? Your liberal masters. They must have really loved that dead fuck..."

links.title: The Deserter: "The old man stares at his own print..."
links.text: The old man stares at his own prints in the ash around the fire. Silent suddenly, some strange process within him. A gush of wind. Seagulls in the distance.

links.title: Logic: "You've almost got him. Just a last..."
links.text: You've almost got him. Just a last little push...

links.text: More. He's gonna crack, but you need a little more.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "The maker is called Sansarique -- y..."
links.text: The maker is called Sansarique -- you see their V-shaped logo -- but can't make out the size.

links.title: You: ""Show me the soles of your shoes pl..."
links.text: "Show me the soles of your shoes please."

links.title: You: ""Fine. Let's leave it at that.""
links.text: "Fine. Let's leave it at that."

links.title: The Deserter: ""You fascists have the tenacity of..."
links.text: "You fascists have the tenacity of a limpet." He wipes dirt off his running shoe.

links.title: You: ""You did it -- because you're on th..."
links.text: "You did it -- because you're on the side of the Union, right? It was political."

links.title: The Deserter: ""The DÃ©bardeurs' Union is a social..."
links.text: "The DÃ©bardeurs' Union is a social democratic piss-stain, and the fat bourgeois pig who keeps it..." He shakes his head.

links.title: You: ""Mr. Claire? What about him?""
links.text: "Mr. Claire? What about him?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Never trust a social democrat. Soc..."
links.text: "Never trust a social democrat. Social democrats are pederasts -- and women. They're the real enemy."

links.title: Rhetoric: "There is *something* here for later..."
links.text: There is *something* here for later, he knows his name. But don't let this break the pace now, push forward...

links.title: You: ""You did it. You had the means *and..."
links.text: "You did it. You had the means *and* the motive. It's over."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Over? It was *over* when they shel..."
links.text: "Over? It was *over* when they shelled the coast... and bodies ripped apart from the pressure. It was *over* then. For all of us." His eyes look right through you.

links.title: The Deserter: ""You fucks don't understand. The or..."
links.text: "You fucks don't understand. The ordnance, the mist of blood... it's *beyond belief* their aggression, when you attack their class interests."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm sorry for what happened." The..."
links.text: "I'm sorry for what happened." The lieutenant softens his voice: "But we're not *with* the Moralintern. We're Revacholian citizenry, like you."

links.title: The Deserter: ""You're the enemy," his voice scree..."
links.text: "You're the enemy," his voice screeches. "You're halberdiers of the market liberal regime."

links.title: Suggestion: "He would really, *really* get riled..."
links.text: He would really, *really* get riled up if you said:

links.title: You: ""You're right. I'm a collaborationi..."
links.text: "You're right. I'm a collaborationist, but I at least *do* something. I keep peace on the streets, while you just break everything."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Keep the *peace*? You call this pe..."
links.text: "Keep the *peace*? You call this peace? Every twenty seconds there's a gun shot. The war's still there, only we're *losing* it..." he almost chokes from his own voice.

links.title: Half Light: "You *see* the killer in him. Coughi..."
links.text: You *see* the killer in him. Coughing from the thin intensity of his own voice. The words have run out, his eyes budge from their sockets.

links.title: Conceptualization: "The whole world is a locked mechani..."
links.text: The whole world is a locked mechanism for him, all of history, with only one shaft of light that shone in 44 years ago.

links.title: Composure: "In his fit of rage he seems to have..."
links.text: In his fit of rage he seems to have broken loose from something. A little fire gutters deep in his eyes, like a pilot light in the hallway...

links.title: Suggestion: "Just one more, it can't be more tha..."
links.text: Just one more, it can't be more than one now...

links.title: You: ""I'm Revacholian like you. I don't..."
links.text: "I'm Revacholian like you. I don't work for the dogs up in La Delta. I subvert the system from within."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Subvert the system from *within*....."
links.text: "Subvert the system from *within*... you diseased dog! You lick their balls, that's what you do..." he almost chokes from his own voice.

links.title: You: ""I'm ten times more radical than yo..."
links.text: "I'm ten times more radical than you. I'm a radical centrist. I keep this place *sane*."

links.title: The Deserter: ""You call this *sane*? Every twenty..."
links.text: "You call this *sane*? Every twenty seconds there's a gun shot. Kids shooting shit, while they come and pick them... fucking child molesters..." he almost chokes from his own voice.

links.title: You: ""We're going to have a parliament...."
links.text: "We're going to have a parliament. It will safeguard the market and stabilize the streets. That's what *I'm* for -- real democracy."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Stabilize... that parliament will..."
links.text: "Stabilize... that parliament will be the lock on the cage. It won't *stabilize* shit. The market is ruin, dripping with pity and suffering..." he almost chokes from his own voice.

links.title: You: ""I know what happened here, in this..."
links.text: "I know what happened here, in this city. You rabid lunatics tore it to pieces and killed 50 million people."

links.title: The Deserter: ""It was 200,000! 200,000 tops. Thos..."
links.text: "It was 200,000! 200,000 tops. Those numbers are *madness*," he hisses. "Millions, tens of millions have died after the Landing! In *your* hands..." he almost chokes from his own voice.

links.title: You: ""I don't care. I don't care what ha..."
links.text: "I don't care. I don't care what happened 50 years ago. This is now and I need to keep the city safe."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Safe? You call this safe? This is..."
links.text: "Safe? You call this safe? This is *defeat*! Every twenty seconds there's a gun shot. The war never ended, we're just *losing* it..." he almost chokes from his own voice.

links.title: Cuno: ""We ain't with them yo," the kid sp..."
links.text: "We ain't with them yo," the kid splurts. "This is fuckin' Revachol West representin' here."

links.title: The Deserter: ""You're with the enemy, kid." His v..."
links.text: "You're with the enemy, kid." His voice screeches. "A fucking halberdier of the market-liberal regime."

links.title: You: ""I don't need your cooperation. I'v..."
links.text: "I don't need your cooperation. I've got this." (Show him the Triangong 4-46.)

links.title: The Deserter: ""Heh...""
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not a lot of guns around that use..."
links.text: "Not a lot of guns around that use military-grade ammunition, are there?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""It's a real gun," he points to the..."
links.text: "It's a real gun," he points to the lieutenant's holster, "not like your little musketeer pistols. I've seen you prance around with those, jumping hoops for the liberals..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""You look like imbeciles. Why don't..."
links.text: "You look like imbeciles. Why don't you ask them to give you real weapons, huh?" He chortles. "Going against automatic rifles with a *flame bomb*... of course you got all those boys killed!"

links.title: Half Light: "Damn, he saw you. He's watched it h..."
links.text: Damn, he saw you. He's watched it happen.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "He would have a good view of the tr..."
links.text: He would have a good view of the tribunal from here. It's not just empty  boasting.

links.title: Volition: "So he saw you... okay. So what. Don..."
links.text: So he saw you... okay. So what. Don't let it divert you.

links.title: You: ""We saved a lot of them -- their le..."
links.text: "We saved a lot of them -- their leader Titus... We handled that situation."

links.title: The Deserter: ""You didn't handle anything. I watc..."
links.text: "You didn't handle anything. I watched it happen -- you let those fucks rip right into them. Got that girl killed too."

links.title: The Deserter: ""None of those people mean *anythin..."
links.text: "None of those people mean *anything* to you. The vultures feed on this city and you prepare the meal for them."

links.title: Rhetoric: "You're getting diverted. Push the g..."
links.text: You're getting diverted. Push the gun. Only the gun matters.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So you watched the fight?" The lie..."
links.text: "So you watched the fight?" The lieutenant points inland. "Did you like what you saw? The mayhem? It was all your doing. Your plan. *You* got them killed."

links.title: The Deserter: ""You don't know anything..." A twit..."
links.text: "You don't know anything..." A twitch runs across the right side of his face as he stares the lieutenant down.

links.title: The Deserter: ""You didn't handle anything. I watc..."
links.text: "You didn't handle anything. I watched it happen -- you let those murderers rip right into them. Got most of them killed, even the fat one."

links.title: You: ""We saved a lot of them -- Alain, u..."
links.text: "We saved a lot of them -- Alain, uhm, and that musician... we handled it."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Like *fuck* you did. I watched it..."
links.text: "Like *fuck* you did. I watched it happen, you let those beasts rip right into them. You got that girl killed like it was *nothing*."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Like *fuck* you did. You didn't ha..."
links.text: "Like *fuck* you did. You didn't handle anything. I watched it happen, you let those beasts rip right into them. Got the fat kid killed, the old man too."

links.title: You: ""Stop changing the subject -- we ha..."
links.text: "Stop changing the subject -- we have the murder weapon." (Point to it.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You know what... You're right. I'm..."
links.text: "You know what... You're right. I'm convinced this made the shot. Should we call it?" The lieutenant looks at the weapon demonstratively.

links.title: You: "(Dramatically ask.) "You think we h..."
links.text: (Dramatically ask.) "You think we have the murder weapon?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""4.46 jacketed ammunition, modified..."
links.text: "4.46 jacketed ammunition, modified for range," he lists. "We have it. This is it."

links.title: You: ""I'm calling it: we have the murder..."
links.text: "I'm calling it: we have the murder weapon."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good..." The lieutenant takes out..."
links.text: "Good..." The lieutenant takes out his notebook and draws a single line.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This feels good, doesn't it? Tying..."
links.text: "This feels good, doesn't it? Tying things up like this -- when you have the murder weapon, you have the killer."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Murder..." The old man does not sa..."
links.text: "Murder..." The old man does not say more -- he just glances into the reeds and then twitches once more...

links.title: Volition: "Like a marionette, on some invisibl..."
links.text: Like a marionette, on some invisible string...

links.title: Logic: "Tie up every loose end, now. There'..."
links.text: Tie up every loose end, now. There's no other chance.

links.title: Suggestion: "This pushed him, but not enough......"
links.text: This pushed him, but not enough... just a little more...

links.title: You: ""Stop squirming. I have the murder..."
links.text: "Stop squirming. I have the murder weapon."

links.title: The Deserter: ""You let them all die. Pranced arou..."
links.text: "You let them all die. Pranced around, let your little *friend* be shot too... I didn't get a good look at that, tell me, did he bleed out?"

links.title: You: ""Don't talk to me about Kim!""
links.text: "Don't talk to me about Kim!"

links.title: The Deserter: ""I know what it feels like. I lost..."
links.text: "I know what it feels like. I lost people because I was weak too."

links.title: You: ""Shut up. I'm calling it: I have th..."
links.text: "Shut up. I'm calling it: I have the murder weapon."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Who are you trying to prove this t..."
links.text: "Who are you trying to prove this to, huh? Your friend? He's not here." He cracks his knuckles: "He's dead, isn't he?"

links.title: You: ""He's not dead, he's in the hospita..."
links.text: "He's not dead, he's in the hospital."

links.title: The Deserter: ""The world will *rejoice* when he d..."
links.text: "The world will *rejoice* when he dies. One fascha less..." He hisses, then glances into the reeds and twitches suddenly...

links.title: You: ""That's the murder weapon down. I'v..."
links.text: "That's the murder weapon down. I've got more on you."

links.title: You: ""Okay then." (Concede.)"
links.text: "Okay then." (Concede.)

links.title: The Deserter: ""Imbecile..." He shakes his head."
links.text: "Imbecile..." He shakes his head.

links.title: The Deserter: ""You look like imbeciles. Why don't..."
links.text: "You look like imbeciles. Why don't you ask them to give you *real* weapons?" He chortles. "Going against automatic rifles with these toy guns... of course you got those boys killed!"

links.title: The Deserter: ""It's a real gun," he points at the..."
links.text: "It's a real gun," he points at the lieutenant's sidearm, "not like your musketeer pistols."

links.title: Cuno: ""Got nothing to say about that boom..."
links.text: "Got nothing to say about that boomstick, huh? You chokin'? That's the stick that did it!"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Yes, it's a *real* gun, not like y..."
links.text: "Yes, it's a *real* gun, not like your little musketeer pistols. I've seen you prance around with those, jumping hoops for the liberals..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""It's a real gun, not like the litt..."
links.text: "It's a real gun, not like the little musketeer pistols you RCM fasces have."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "You know peacetime laws in Moralint..."
links.text: You know peacetime laws in Moralintern-affiliated nations forbid it -- it's a rarity.

links.title: You: ""It's a rare weapon. I've got you w..."
links.text: "It's a rare weapon. I've got you with this one. No one else has these."

links.title: You: ""Looks to me like it could be used..."
links.text: "Looks to me like it could be used for a long range shot."

links.title: You: ""I've done the ballistics." (Point..."
links.text: "I've done the ballistics." (Point to the tower.) "The shot came from this island."

links.title: The Deserter: ""I saw you poking around there, loo..."
links.text: "I saw you poking around there, looking for evidence. You're damn diligent when it comes to dead *fasces*." A jitter passes him: "Did you like the view?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You had direct visibility. There a..."
links.text: "You had direct visibility. There are embrasures in the concrete, *specifically* meant for a topfaller to use. And you had a long range rifle in your possession." The lieutenant softens his voice:

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You've been here a long time, Mr...."
links.text: "You've been here a long time, Mr. Dros -- too long. You clearly need medical aid..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""I'm ready to die," the man interru..."
links.text: "I'm ready to die," the man interrupts him, then coughs: "I've done my part."

links.title: Rhetoric: "He's practically admitting to it: d..."
links.text: He's practically admitting to it: dead *fasces* -- for *fascist* -- done his *part*.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You've been here a long time, Mr...."
links.text: "You've been here a long time, Mr. Dros -- too long. You need medical aid..."

links.title: Rhetoric: "He's practically admitting to it."
links.text: He's practically admitting to it.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Just one thing remains unclear: the..."
links.text: Just one thing remains unclear: the rifle does not seem to have a scope.

links.title: You: ""One thing -- where's the *scope*?..."
links.text: "One thing -- where's the *scope*? How did you make the shot without a scope? We have everything else..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Forget about your stupid fucking s..."
links.text: "Forget about your stupid fucking scope, I don't know where it is! Find it yourself -- it's your problem now."

links.title: Drama: "He *lost* it, he just doesn't know..."
links.text: He *lost* it, he just doesn't know where it is, forget it, push on...

links.title: You: ""You said *fasces*? You're admittin..."
links.text: "You said *fasces*? You're admitting you killed him?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""You're sad for your fascha brother..."
links.text: "You're sad for your fascha brother aren't you? One twig got broken, now the others are sad..." He waves his hand. There's a twitch -- then one more one in his right eye...

links.title: Half Light: "A spasm of rage, sudden and uncontr..."
links.text: A spasm of rage, sudden and uncontrollable.

links.title: Logic: "Leave no stone unturned! Get him on..."
links.text: Leave no stone unturned! Get him on what matters most!

links.title: Suggestion: "Almost! He almost burst out there...."
links.text: Almost! He almost burst out there. Keep piling arguments, anything...

links.title: You: ""It's the best uninterrupted line o..."
links.text: "It's the best uninterrupted line of sight into that window in all of Martinaise."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Because it's a *sniper's nest*, yo..."
links.text: "Because it's a *sniper's nest*, you stupid fuck. Radio Gauche is right, you have worms in your brain..." Another sudden twitch, then one more one in his right eye...

links.title: You: ""The view was perfect. With a pair..."
links.text: "The view was perfect. With a pair of binoculars I could've seen *in* the room."

links.title: Visual Calculus: "He's practically admitting to it. J..."
links.text: He's practically admitting to it. Just one thing -- the rifle does not have a scope.

links.title: You: ""You're a communist. I talked to th..."
links.text: "You're a communist. I talked to the dead man, he *told* me communism killed him."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Stupid droite." He scoffs."
links.text: "Stupid droite." He scoffs.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks at you with wo..."
links.text: The lieutenant looks at you with worry in his eyes.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Not this, he seems to say. Anything..."
links.text: Not this, he seems to say. Anything but this.

links.title: You: ""Yes. I held a *seance* with his *s..."
links.text: "Yes. I held a *seance* with his *soul*. It has shown me the way -- and the way leads to you."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Matter does not behave in such a w..."
links.text: "Matter does not behave in such a way. Those are aberrant bourgeois musings: magic *erl-creatures*, esoteric theosophy. It's all cryptofascism."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Your brain is *rotting* from the r..."
links.text: "Your brain is *rotting* from the radio waves." He looks at the air, then turns to the lieutenant.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He does not answer the provocation...."
links.text: He does not answer the provocation. It does not look like he thinks this approach worked.

links.title: Suggestion: "Yeah... this just did nothing."
links.text: Yeah... this just did nothing.

links.title: Inland Empire: "But still, somehow you *knew* it wa..."
links.text: But still, somehow you *knew* it was a communist.

links.title: You: "How?"
links.text: How?

links.title: Inland Empire: "Perhaps you suspected it *before* y..."
links.text: Perhaps you suspected it *before* you took the case.

links.title: Logic: "The vision was you remembering that..."
links.text: The vision was you remembering that.

links.title: You: "But this *did* nothing."
links.text: But this *did* nothing.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Was it *supposed* to?"
links.text: Was it *supposed* to?

links.title: You: "I will look deeper then."
links.text: I will look deeper then.

links.title: Inland Empire: "The inland sea is dark, vast, and o..."
links.text: The inland sea is dark, vast, and on the surface meaningless...

links.title: You: "Actually, I'm beginning to think he..."
links.text: Actually, I'm beginning to think he's right and this is just cryptofascism.

links.title: Inland Empire: "No. There is more here. A sliver of..."
links.text: No. There is more here. A sliver of something. Some kind of future.

links.title: You: "Yes, I see. It's intuitive. (Nod.)..."
links.text: Yes, I see. It's intuitive. (Nod.) Like fascism.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Yes. You have a vast royalist soul..."
links.text: Yes. You have a vast royalist soul and it's reaching out for something -- in the future.

links.title: You: "Is this... the miracle?"
links.text: Is this... the miracle?

links.title: Inland Empire: "No. The miracle is still waiting. T..."
links.text: No. The miracle is still waiting. This is the darkness.

links.title: You: "But aren't I... way out in the West..."
links.text: But aren't I... way out in the West?

links.title: Inland Empire: "You are. Soon it will happen."
links.text: You are. Soon it will happen.

links.title: You: "Turn back to him."
links.text: Turn back to him.

links.title: The Deserter: ""Standing there, slack-jawed," the..."
links.text: "Standing there, slack-jawed," the old man shakes his head. "Brain *festering*..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Your brain is *rotting* from the r..."
links.text: "Your brain is *rotting* from the radio waves." He looks at the air, then turns to the kid. "You too. They're *twisting* you."

links.title: Cuno: ""Whatever, man..." Cuno looks at yo..."
links.text: "Whatever, man..." Cuno looks at you. It doesn't look like he thinks this worked.

links.title: The Deserter: ""Your brain is rotting from radio w..."
links.text: "Your brain is rotting from radio waves..." He looks at the air, then squints with suspicion.

links.title: You: ""You fucked with the wrong police o..."
links.text: "You fucked with the wrong police officer. I have para-natural abilities."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Nature does not behave in a *para-..."
links.text: "Nature does not behave in a *para-natural* manner," he scoffs. "Aberrant bourgeois musings -- magic *erl-creatures* and esoteric sensations. It's all cryptofascism."

links.title: You: ""It was intuition. Had he spoken, h..."
links.text: "It was intuition. Had he spoken, he would have said communism killed him."

links.title: The Deserter: ""*Intuition* is an aberrant psychol..."
links.text: "*Intuition* is an aberrant psychologism." He chortles. "It reeks of cryptofascism. The parasite class use intuition to justify their rank in life. It's all just palmistry and magic *erl-creatures*."

links.title: You: "C'mon, what am I forgetting? (Hit y..."
links.text: C'mon, what am I forgetting? (Hit yourself on the side of your head.)

links.title: Logic: "Wait, here it comes -- the god damn..."
links.text: Wait, here it comes -- the god damn May bells, the dried may bells on Klaasje's roof!

links.title: You: "Oh yes!"
links.text: Oh yes!

links.title: Logic: "There were May bells in the grass w..."
links.text: There were May bells in the grass when you got here! They're revolutionary symbols, from the war!

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Nowhere else -- nowhere in all of M..."
links.text: Nowhere else -- nowhere in all of Martinaise have you seen them this spring.

links.title: You: "My head hurts now."
links.text: My head hurts now.

links.title: Logic: "Who cares -- there were May bells i..."
links.text: Who cares -- there were May bells in the grass when you got here!  And on Klaasje's balcony!

links.title: Logic: "Wait, here it comes -- the god damn..."
links.text: Wait, here it comes -- the god damn May bells, the dried may bells on Klaasje's roof!

links.title: You: "Oh yes!"
links.text: Oh yes!

links.title: Logic: "There were May bells in the grass w..."
links.text: There were May bells in the grass when you got here! And may bells on Klaasje's balcony!

links.title: Perception (Sight): "And nowhere else -- nowhere in all..."
links.text: And nowhere else -- nowhere in all of Martinaise have you seen them!

links.title: You: "My head hurts now."
links.text: My head hurts now.

links.title: Logic: "Who cares -- there were May bells i..."
links.text: Who cares -- there were May bells in the grass when you got here, *and* on Klaasje's balcony! Is this a coincidence?

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Wait, don't forget the footprints!..."
links.text: Wait, don't forget the footprints! The diagonal prints in the dust in the secret space behind Klaasje's bedroom! *Now* they're gonna come up!

links.title: You: "Of course! Thank you, head, thank y..."
links.text: Of course! Thank you, head, thank you.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "You got it! Remember, the boot prin..."
links.text: You got it! Remember, the boot prints were like no *modern* sole...

links.title: Endurance: "Maybe don't beat yourself any more..."
links.text: Maybe don't beat yourself any more though? You're not immortal.

links.title: You: "Ow..."
links.text: Ow...

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Yes. Ouch. So good it *hurts*. Thos..."
links.text: Yes. Ouch. So good it *hurts*. Those were not *modern* prints...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Nothing else comes up. You see the..."
links.text: Nothing else comes up. You see the lieutenant watch you try to stimulate thought processes by hitting yourself.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "I'm sorry this didn't do anything....."
links.text: I'm sorry this didn't do anything... usually hurting yourself does.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Officer, a word..." He gestures to..."
links.text: "Officer, a word..." He gestures to talk to you on the side.

links.title: Cuno: "Nothing else comes up. You see the..."
links.text: Nothing else comes up. You see the Cuno watch you try to stimulate thought processes by hitting yourself.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "I'm sorry this didn't do anything....."
links.text: I'm sorry this didn't do anything... usually hurting yourself does.

links.title: Cuno: ""Yo, a word..." He gestures to talk..."
links.text: "Yo, a word..." He gestures to talk to you on the side.

links.title: The Deserter: "Nothing else comes up. The old man..."
links.text: Nothing else comes up. The old man watches you stimulate thoughts by hitting yourself.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "I'm sorry this didn't do anything....."
links.text: I'm sorry this didn't do anything... usually hurting yourself does.

links.title: You: ""My god... I've got nothing at all!""
links.text: "My god... I've got nothing at all!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "You see the lieutenant watch you tr..."
links.text: You see the lieutenant watch you try to stimulate thought processes by hitting yourself.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "I'm sorry this didn't do anything....."
links.text: I'm sorry this didn't do anything... usually hurting yourself does something for you.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Officer, a word..." He gestures to..."
links.text: "Officer, a word..." He gestures to talk to you on the side.

links.title: You: ""No, I'm almost there! Just let me..."
links.text: "No, I'm almost there! Just let me have a few more punches..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Almost *where?* Almost ready to bl..."
links.text: "Almost *where?* Almost ready to bleed to death?" He looks at the bloodstain on your pant leg...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, c'mon." The lieutenant's impat..."
links.text: "No, c'mon." The lieutenant's impatient. "A *word*, let's go."

links.title: You: ""Excuse us for a moment, Mr. Dros."..."
links.text: "Excuse us for a moment, Mr. Dros." [Leave.]

links.title: Cuno: "You see the Cuno watch you try to s..."
links.text: You see the Cuno watch you try to stimulate thought processes by hitting yourself.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "I'm sorry this didn't do anything....."
links.text: I'm sorry this didn't do anything... usually hurting yourself does something for you.

links.title: Cuno: ""Yo, a word..." He gestures to talk..."
links.text: "Yo, a word..." He gestures to talk to you on the side.

links.title: You: ""No, I'm almost there! Just let me..."
links.text: "No, I'm almost there! Just let me have a few more punches..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Almost *where?* Almost ready to bl..."
links.text: "Almost *where?* Almost ready to bleed to death?" He looks at the bloodstain on your pant leg...

links.title: Cuno: ""No, c'mon." He's half whispering...."
links.text: "No, c'mon." He's half whispering. "A *word*, let's go."

links.title: You: ""Excuse us for a moment, Mr. Dros."..."
links.text: "Excuse us for a moment, Mr. Dros." [Leave.]

links.title: The Deserter: "Nothing comes up. The old man watch..."
links.text: Nothing comes up. The old man watches you stimulate thoughts by hitting yourself.

links.title: Half Light: "Fucking communard! Fucking asshole!..."
links.text: Fucking communard! Fucking asshole! Look at him, just staring -- hit him where it hurts!

links.title: Conceptualization: "Politics. Hit him with POLITICS and..."
links.text: Politics. Hit him with POLITICS and he may start giving his motive...

links.title: You: ""Okay. Let's back off for a moment...."
links.text: "Okay. Let's back off for a moment. Tell me this..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""You're lost, droite. You're lost....."
links.text: "You're lost, droite. You're lost..." He shakes his head, tufts of grey-white hair on his skull and chin...

links.title: Logic: "That's right. Pile it all on him no..."
links.text: That's right. Pile it all on him now. Three should do it, maybe four...

dialogueTree.title: The Deserter: ""I've used it for killing people.""
The Deserter: "No reply. His leg twitches."

links.title: Inland Empire: "Strangely... like a puppet on a str..."
links.text: Strangely... like a puppet on a string. There's something off, you feel it. This was the right question. You just...

links.title: Composure: "You went in too fast. Over-eager."
links.text: You went in too fast. Over-eager.

links.title: Suggestion: "You need to *contextualize* it for..."
links.text: You need to *contextualize* it for him first. Turn the key elsewhere -- the lock is here. It's here.

links.title: Rhetoric: "He sounds like he hasn't gotten to..."
links.text: He sounds like he hasn't gotten to speak to another human being in a long time. Especially about politics. That's what you should do first.

dialogueTree.title: The Deserter: ""What have I used it for..." He loo..."
dialogueTree.text: "What have I used it for..." He looks you dead in the eye: "I've used it for *killing people*."

links.title: Half Light: "Here we go! A trail of blood, the l..."
links.text: Here we go! A trail of blood, the lieutenant smells it too...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Killing people?""
links.text: "Killing people?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""It's a gun. That's what they're fo..."
links.text: "It's a gun. That's what they're for. You want a moralist euphemism -- defending your family and your property? I haven't done that."

links.title: The Deserter: ""I've used it to kill people.""
links.text: "I've used it to kill people."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Interesting." The lieutenant nods...."
links.text: "Interesting." The lieutenant nods. "During, or *after* the War?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""There is no *after* the war." He s..."
links.text: "There is no *after* the war." He shakes his head and smiles, his teeth rotten black: "Class war is never over."

links.title: Logic: "So he's continued killing *after* h..."
links.text: So he's continued killing *after* hostilities ended. Okay, okay...

links.title: Reaction Speed: "This is it. You can feel it, like b..."
links.text: This is it. You can feel it, like battery acid on the tip of your tongue -- something you haven't felt in a while, but...

links.title: You: "But what?"
links.text: But what?

links.title: Reaction Speed: "This is what you *live* for. This i..."
links.text: This is what you *live* for. This is *the shit*.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "The great serotonin jackpot."
links.text: The great serotonin jackpot.

links.title: Logic: "THE SOLUTION."
links.text: THE SOLUTION.

links.title: You: "No time!"
links.text: No time!

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Of course, you're on the trail now,..."
links.text: Of course, you're on the trail now, move in...

links.title: Half Light: "... for the kill."
links.text: ... for the kill.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Go in straight, no euphemisms, he d..."
links.text: Go in straight, no euphemisms, he doesn't like those...

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "No-no. Be careful now, slow and ste..."
links.text: No-no. Be careful now, slow and steady does it. Make him repeat it first.

links.title: Suggestion: "Don't mess this up, remember -- he..."
links.text: Don't mess this up, remember -- he *wants* to tell you. Get personal.

links.title: You: ""So you're saying you killed people..."
links.text: "So you're saying you killed people, *after* active fighting stopped?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""What did I just say..." He keeps s..."
links.text: "What did I just say..." He keeps shaking his head, erratically suddenly. He brushes something out of his eye...

links.title: Rhetoric: "What did *I* just tell you? Don't d..."
links.text: What did *I* just tell you? Don't drop the ball now...

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Oh no, you were wrong. Don't listen..."
links.text: Oh no, you were wrong. Don't listen to your *hands* for god's sake, you're too close...

links.title: You: ""Did you use that gun to shoot and..."
links.text: "Did you use that gun to shoot and kill the mercenary on the coast?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""The who now?" He leans in and cups..."
links.text: "The who now?" He leans in and cups his ear.

links.title: Drama: "He heard you. He just wants to hear..."
links.text: He heard you. He just wants to hear you say it again. This is dramatic flare on his part... Right choice, we're in! Do it, sire!

links.title: You: ""The corpse in ceramic armour, hang..."
links.text: "The corpse in ceramic armour, hanging behind the Whirling-in-Rags. Did you shoot him?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Oh yes... that one," he looks up a..."
links.text: "Oh yes... that one," he looks up at the sky and clacks his tongue: "Ugly piece of work, that boy..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Did you *kill* him?" The lieutenan..."
links.text: "Did you *kill* him?" The lieutenant takes a sudden step toward him.

links.title: The Deserter: ""I am a son of a welder, and an off..."
links.text: "I am a son of a welder, and an officer of the Commune of Revachol." He spits a big one at your feet. "I do not collaborate with murderers and pederasts of the liberal regime."

links.title: Perception (Sight): "A drop of blood in the saliva..."
links.text: A drop of blood in the saliva...

links.title: Half Light: "Tear into him. Pile it on him. Ever..."
links.text: Tear into him. Pile it on him. Everything you got on him, the more the better...

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "The gun. The murder weapon is the p..."
links.text: The gun. The murder weapon is the perfect opener.

links.title: Perception (Smell): "The scent of blood in the air... bu..."
links.text: The scent of blood in the air... but what else? There was something you can't remember...

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Something about the tracks? Suddenl..."
links.text: Something about the tracks? Suddenly all those tracks are so confusing... go with something else first!

links.title: Logic: "Exhaust him with proof. Pile it all..."
links.text: Exhaust him with proof. Pile it all on him, get a confession.

links.title: Cuno: ""Did you *kill* him?" The kid puffs..."
links.text: "Did you *kill* him?" The kid puffs his chest. "Fucking tell this cop."

links.title: Authority: "Now. Push him now."
links.text: Now. Push him now.

links.title: You: "(Step closer:) "Did you fucking sho..."
links.text: (Step closer:) "Did you fucking shoot him?"

links.title: You: ""What does that mean? Did you kill..."
links.text: "What does that mean? Did you kill him?"

links.title: You: ""The fascist death squad who took a..."
links.text: "The fascist death squad who took a bullet in the mouth on the night of March 4th."

links.title: You: ""His name was Ellis Kortenaer. He w..."
links.text: "His name was Ellis Kortenaer. He was part of a security detail here in Martinaise."

links.title: You: ""A beautiful, strong man sent here..."
links.text: "A beautiful, strong man sent here by the honourable private military company Krenel."

links.title: The Deserter: ""*What*?""
links.text: "*What*?"

links.title: You: ""He was sent to protect fair, just,..."
links.text: "He was sent to protect fair, just, beautiful corporate interests in an ugly labour dispute. He was murdered."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Are you being *clever*? What is th..."
links.text: "Are you being *clever*? What is this socially abhorrent joke?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Watch your mouth, Mr. Dros." The l..."
links.text: "Watch your mouth, Mr. Dros." The lieutenant squeezes the handle of his pistol.

links.title: You: ""I'm absolutely sincere. Now, did y..."
links.text: "I'm absolutely sincere. Now, did you use that rifle to shoot him?"

links.title: You: ""Okay, I mean the paramilitary deat..."
links.text: "Okay, I mean the paramilitary death squad."

links.title: You: ""He died in the arms of a lover, gu..."
links.text: "He died in the arms of a lover, guarding her *and* the fragile, beautiful corporate interests of Wild Pines against militant labour."

links.title: You: ""I've said enough. Did you kill him?""
links.text: "I've said enough. Did you kill him?"

links.title: You: ""You know who I mean.""
links.text: "You know who I mean."

links.title: The Deserter: ""The worm, there?" He spits southwa..."
links.text: "The worm, there?" He spits southward, then points at your armour: "In the monster-armour you *took* from him."

links.title: You: ""It's to protect myself.""
links.text: "It's to protect myself."

links.title: The Deserter: ""You don't have to explain to me......"
links.text: "You don't have to explain to me..." He flashes a gap-tooth smile. "An ugly piece of work, that boy..."

links.title: You: "Nod."
links.text: Nod.

links.title: The Deserter: ""An ugly piece of work, that boy......"
links.text: "An ugly piece of work, that boy..." He flashes a gap-tooth smile.

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: The Deserter: ""It is him, isn't it?" He flashes a..."
links.text: "It is him, isn't it?" He flashes a gap-tooth smile. "An ugly piece of work, that boy..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""The worm, there?" He spits southwa..."
links.text: "The worm, there?" He spits southward, toward the coast. "In the monster-armour?"

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "He heard you. He just wants to hear..."
links.text: He heard you. He just wants to hear you say it... you're in!

links.title: You: ""I know you *want* to tell me -- ha..."
links.text: "I know you *want* to tell me -- have you killed anyone with that gun in the last week or two?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""I don't *want* to tell you anythin..."
links.text: "I don't *want* to tell you anything, you grotesque murderer."

links.title: Suggestion: "And *why* did you think that was a..."
links.text: And *why* did you think that was a good idea? Don't listen to me -- I'm wrong *all the time*.

links.title: Half Light: "That's not the *kill*, that's runni..."
links.text: That's not the *kill*, that's running circles, sink your teeth in it for God's sake...

links.title: You: "Wait -- so which one do I say then?"
links.text: Wait -- so which one do I say then?

links.title: The Deserter: "Nothing comes to you. Silence, his..."
links.text: Nothing comes to you. Silence, his black eyes look at you.

links.title: Shivers: "And in them -- a chill, like electr..."
links.text: And in them -- a chill, like electricity running up your spine. Crawling into your skull:

links.title: You: "What?"
links.text: What?

links.title: Shivers: "ALL IS NOT AS IT SEEMS."
links.text: ALL IS NOT AS IT SEEMS.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Detective?" The lieutenant turns t..."
links.text: "Detective?" The lieutenant turns to you, with well disguised impatience.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Dammit, ask it already! -- he wants..."
links.text: Dammit, ask it already! -- he wants to say.

links.title: Cuno: ""Well?" The Cuno turns to you, with..."
links.text: "Well?" The Cuno turns to you, with impatience.

links.title: You: "Brush it off."
links.text: Brush it off.

links.title: Shivers: "The feeling dissipates, the silence..."
links.text: The feeling dissipates, the silence remains.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Be careful now, slow and steady doe..."
links.text: Be careful now, slow and steady does it. Make him repeat it first.

links.title: Cuno: ""You mean like... lately? *After* t..."
links.text: "You mean like... lately? *After* the War?

links.title: Logic: "When? Before or after the war?"
links.text: When? Before or after the war?

links.title: You: ""And this has been during, or *afte..."
links.text: "And this has been during, or *after* the War?"

links.title: You: ""You mean, like, during the war?""
links.text: "You mean, like, during the war?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Why not?" He shakes his head and s..."
links.text: "Why not?" He shakes his head and smiles, his teeth rotten black: "Class war is never over."

links.title: Half Light: "Here we go! A trail of blood."
links.text: Here we go! A trail of blood.

links.title: Perception (Smell): "Even the kid can smell it..."
links.text: Even the kid can smell it...

links.title: Cuno: ""Killing people? Like straight *off..."
links.text: "Killing people? Like straight *offin'* them?"

links.title: Perception (Smell): "You can smell it."
links.text: You can smell it.

links.title: You: ""Killing people?""
links.text: "Killing people?"

links.title: You: ""You've done a lot of that?""
links.text: "You've done a lot of that?"

links.title: You: ""Nice and honest...""
links.text: "Nice and honest..."
